alert.note: Alert for Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 04 at 5:41PM CDT until May 04 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CREEK...SOUTHEASTERN PAWNEE AND WEST CENTRAL TULSA COUNTIES... At 541 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Kellyville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations in or near the path include... Sand Springs... Sapulpa... Mannford... Kellyville... Westport... Keystone State Park... Gray... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 195 and 217. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
